results.title: Targeting inflammation and redox perturbations by lisinopril mitigates Freund's adjuvant-induced arthritis in rats: role of JAK-2/STAT-3/RANKL axis, MMPs, and VEGF.
results.text_hl: Meanwhile, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ curbed the downstream @<m>DISEASE_Cartilage_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002357 @@@cartilage@@@ degradation signals matrix metalloproteinases (@GENE_MMP3 @GENE_171045 @@@MMP-3@@@ and @GENE_MMP9 @GENE_81687 @@@MMP-9@@@) and the @DISEASE_Tooth_Erosion @DISEASE_MESH:D014077 @@@bone erosion@@@ cue @GENE_TNFSF11 @GENE_117516 @@@RANKL@@@.
